channel.title: There is no ICQ protocal in pidgin
channel.description:
I followed the command lines here and installed pidgin on whonix workstation. https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Chat
" sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install pidgin
sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install pidgin-otr "
After installed, there is no ICQ protocol under login options, the only 4 protocol available are google talk. facebook, IRC and XMPP.
I have tried the same command lines on my host linux OS, all the protocols including ICQ are available.
Why is this happening?
Thx.

item.title: There is no ICQ protocal in pidgin
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Not as simple as I thought.

Use this to undo everything the pidgin-improved-privacy package does.

To unbreak to previous wrong dpkg-divert command.

Read full topic
item.source: There is no ICQ protocal in pidgin

item.title: There is no ICQ protocal in pidgin
item.dc:creator: godknows
item.description:
[quote=“Patrick, post:2, topic:618”]Insecure protocols are discouraged and therefore disabled by default.

Just now extended documentation on how to re-enable them:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Chat#Pidgin[/quote]

Thank you for replying this Patrick

I have receive this “Removing ‘diversion of /usr/lib/purple-2/libicq.so to /usr/share/pidgin-improved-privacy/usr++lib++purple-2++libicq.so by pidgin-improved-privacy’”.

However after restart, there is still no ICQ option.

Read full topic
item.source: There is no ICQ protocal in pidgin

item.title: There is no ICQ protocal in pidgin
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Insecure protocols are discouraged and therefore disabled by default.

Just now extended documentation on how to re-enable them:

Whonix – 3 May 20

Instant Messenger Chat

Anonymous Chat, IRC, XMPP in Whonix ™ without Tor over Tor.

Read full topic

item.title: There is no ICQ protocal in pidgin
item.dc:creator: godknows
item.description:
I followed the command lines here and installed pidgin on whonix workstation.

Whonix – 3 May 20

Instant Messenger Chat

Anonymous Chat, IRC, XMPP in Whonix ™ without Tor over Tor.

"
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install pidgin

sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install pidgin-otr
"

After installed, there is no ICQ protocol under login options, the only 4 protocol available are google talk. facebook, IRC and XMPP.

I have tried the same command lines on my host linux OS, all the protocols including ICQ are available.

Why is this happening?

Thx.

Read full topic
item.source: There is no ICQ protocal in pidgin
